page.title: 11My Special Place
page.content: My special place is{Devils Water}There are tunnels in the water that I can go through.There are hundreds of wild flowers, yellow,white,blue and red. There is a pool where there are a lot of fish. I go fishing there. I have caught lots of fish, but they have got away.I go swimming there, and you can play follow-my-leader in the water. The last time I went, I saw two fish jump. I usually go in the holidays because after school we have work to do on the farm.We can bike around at Devils Water. There is interesting wildlife there. We are not quite sure why it is called Devils Water. Some people say it is named after the Norman family d'Eiville,who were lords of the manor, others say it is because the water can look so black and frightening. Robert Gordon
